headline: Allegion Appoints Gregg Sengstack to Board of Directors
summary: DUBLIN, December 04, 2024--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, has appointed Gregg Sengstack, executive chairperson of Franklin Electric Company, Inc., to the Allegion Board of Directors (Board).
